items.title: Malaysia’s EV registrations more than doubled in 2025, Proton e.MAS 7 regains #1 spot in December
items.summary: Registrations of electric vehicles (EVs) in Malaysia have hit an all-time high, based on the latest Road Transport Department (JPJ) data. A total of 44,813 EVs were registered in 2025, representing 105.7% growth year-on-year compared to 21,789 EVs in 2024. In December 2025, 8,123 EVs were registered, more than triple the number recorded in December […]

items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. In this first 2026 edition of 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly, we’re highlighting a fresh batch of notable deals on gaming monitors, keyboards, and other essential peripherals, kicking off the new year with solid savings. There are also some compelling offers surfacing on Windows Copilot+ PCs, with several models dropping to new lows or matching their best prices to date. Whether you’re mapping out a full battlestation overhaul for the new year or eyeing a relatively simple upgrade to your current setup, this week’s roundup delivers plenty of deals worth a closer look. We’ll also briefly touch on a few standout gear that caught our eye at CES this year, including Razer’s Project AVA and even Anker’s 45W Nano charger with a smart display. All of that and more ready for you below.

items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. We’ve seen a number of new Green tech products coming out of the first week of CES 2026, like the Segway Myon e-bike that launched at $1,999.99 shipped, alongside the Muxi e-bike and Xaber 300 electric dirt bike that are slated to release later in the year. Likewise, and with actual savings, you can also find Bluetti having launched its new Alternator & Solar Dual DC Charger 2 + bundles from the annual event, which we secured exclusive savings for starting from $332 shipped, as well as Jackery’s new Explorer 1500 Ultra Portable Power Station and a solar bundle option with up to $700 savings from $899 shipped. Plus, we’ve got New Year power station sales from EcoFlow, Bluetti, and Jackery, as well as countless e-bike sales/deals, and even more waiting for you below.

items.title: Bluetti’s New Year Sale takes up to 53% off power stations and bundles + exclusive bonus savings – all from $119
items.summary:
Running alongside the winter backup deals we spotted, Bluetti also has an ongoing New Year Sale with up to 53% discounts across its power stations, bundles, and accessories. One notable return is the new Elite 400 Portable Power Station at $1,221.06 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS6OFF at checkout, beating out its Amazon pricing by $78. Having been released back in November with an original $2,999 MSRP, the price has since been cut to $2,699 when at full directly from Bluetti’s website, whereas it starts from $1,899 at Amazon. We saw Black Friday and Christmas sales take this model lowest to $1,299, with exclusive savings giving us this same rate we’re seeing again here. You’ll be getting $678 off the going rate during this event ($1,478 off the MSRP) and another shot at the lowest price we have tracked so far. Head below to also browse the full lineup of deals while they’re sticking around.
